channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 19:27 Air alert in Sumy region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 19:27 Air alert in Sumy region. Follow further messages. #Sumy_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 19:12 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now taking place in the Chervonogrigorivsk Territorial Community. Take shelter!
item.description: 🔴 19:12 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now taking place in the Chervonogrigorivsk Territorial Community. Take shelter! #Червоногригоривська_териториальна_громада This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 14:01 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of the civilian population – 0800339291
